readability_reflection: concatenation was more readable due to the universal knowledge of the plus signs meaning. The curly brackets begin to make you think of other programming techniques.
comprehension_debugging: Concatenation made it much faster to know the flow of the logic.

learning_curve: I have deal with string concatenation so it made it much easier for me to pick up on that.
